channel.title: My npcdrop.cfg isn't working!

item.title: My npcdrop.cfg isn't working!
item.dc:creator: @lol156 lol156
item.description:
@lol156 wrote:

hi,
I noticed that my server loads the npcdrops not from npcdrop.cfg like it should be but it seems to be loading it from my item2.java and I would like to fix that if possible (because in item2.java you canâ€™t adjust the drop rates or drop amounts i think)
here is example from item2.java:
public static int barbarian[] = {
1725, 1704, 1038, 3105, 1305, 5698, 4587, 4726, 7386, 7394, 7390, 995};

public static int randombarbarian() {
    return barbarian[(int) (Math.random() * barbarian.length)];
}

and this is my npcdrops.java:
public class NPCDrops {
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];
public int npcId;

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
	npcId = _npcId;
	for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
		Items[i] = -1;
		ItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
}

}

I hope someone knows (and tells) the solution.
ow and I use allstar based source.

Read full topic
